title: Infinite friezes of affine type D
authors:
Karin Baur, L\'ea Bittmann, Emily Gunawan, Gordana Todorov, Emine
  Y{\i}ld{\i}r{\i}m
abstract:
In this article, we study infinite friezes arising from cluster categories of
affine type $D$ and determine the growth coefficients for these friezes. We
prove that for each affine type $D$, the friezes given by the tubes all have
the same growth behavior.
